6654ba83-8189-478a-9444-ebed60778725.css: font-size:40px; color:black;background-color: white; border-color: #b49229; font-weight: bold;

fields.text: You're about to reset the game. Are you sure?

reserve_label.text: Now Choose a card to reserve

one_mover_1-copy001.css: background-color: rgb(255 255 255 / 0%); border-radius: 8px; border:0px; white-space: pre-wrap; color: white; text-shadow: 1px -1px 5px #484848;

3u44.text: This token is to mark the active player, click on the token at the end of your turn to move it to the next player
3u44.css: border-style: solid; background-color: antiquewhite; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center; padding-top: 5px;

3ztw.text: Each player needs to claim an area by sitting in it. Cards that they click on will then move to this area.
3ztw.css: border-style: solid; background-color: antiquewhite; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center; padding-top: 5px;

3ztw-copy001.text: Select the number of players here and then click Restart to setup the board for that many players. Click the '?' to close the help boxes
3ztw-copy001.css: border-style: solid; background-color: antiquewhite; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center; padding-top: 5px;

3ztw-copy001-copy001.text: Each automated action can be undone by clicking this button. Note that some actions, like buying a card, are made up of multiple 'moves' and each move needs to be undone in turn.
3ztw-copy001-copy001.css: border-style: solid; background-color: antiquewhite; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center; padding-top: 5px;

3ztw-copy001-copy001-copy001.text: If you have reserved multiple cards, use the cycle button to look through them. Click on the visible card to 'buy' it
3ztw-copy001-copy001-copy001.css: border-style: solid; background-color: antiquewhite; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center; padding-top: 5px;

yda3.text: Click on a card to buy it. If you can afford it the tokens are automatically spent
yda3.css: border-style: solid; background-color: antiquewhite; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center; padding-top: 5px;

9mzm.text: To Reserve a Card, first click on the Wild yellow token, then on the selected card. If you accidentally click on the card first this can be undone using the undo button.
9mzm.css: border-style: solid; background-color: antiquewhite; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center; padding-top: 5px;

1mu9.text: Click on the colour stack to 'spend' a token form this pile.
1mu9.css: border-style: solid; background-color: antiquewhite; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center; padding-top: 5px;

yda3-copy001.text: Click on a stack of tokens to take one.
yda3-copy001.css: border-style: solid; background-color: antiquewhite; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center; padding-top: 5px;

info.name: Splendid
info.attribution:
The front of the Splendid cards consist of artwork taken from unspash.com 
e.g. https://unsplash.com/photos/LrVgf6xyaWs, and is available under the Unsplash license.

The backs of the decks are created using artwork from freeimages.com and are available under the FreeImages.com license:
https://www.freeimages.com/photo/artist-hand-1420746
https://www.freeimages.com/photo/bible-candles-and-quill-1191928
https://www.freeimages.com/photo/hand-s-dialog-1240944
https://www.freeimages.com/photo/potmaker-1586181

The automation, VTT port, and remaining artwork was created by Shaun Hillier and is released to the public domain by CC0. Inspired by the original PCIO version by https://www.reddit.com/user/robinthecat730.
info.description: Buy cards and gems to collect points.  First player to 15 points wins.
